es.host.label: Elasticsearch Host
es.host.description: Specify the hostname and port for your elasticsearch instance (e.g. localhost:9200).

es.index.label: Index
es.index.description: The index name where the documents will be stored. If the index does not exist, one will be created using elasticsearch defaults

es.type.label: Type
es.type.description: The type the documents will be stored as. If the type does not exist, one will be created. A mapping will be applied to documents of this type, so any existing mapping will be overwritten

es.idField.label: ID Field
es.idField.description: The idField will specify from which field the id of the document is derived. If no field is specified, elasticsearch will generate one
